    • Method Detail

      • getEvalConfig

        public EvalConfig getEvalConfig()

      • addAlgorithm

        public SimpleEvaluator addAlgorithm(AlgorithmInstance algo)
        Adds an algorithmInfo to the TrainTestEvalCommand being built. If any exception is thrown while the command is called it is rethrown as a runtime error.
        Parameters:
        algo - The algorithmInfo added to the TrainTestEvalCommand
        Returns:
        Itself to allow chaining

      • addAlgorithm

        public SimpleEvaluator addAlgorithm(AlgorithmInstanceBuilder algo)
        Adds a fully configured algorithmInfo command to the TrainTestEvalCommand being built.
        Parameters:
        algo - The algorithmInfo added to the TrainTestEvalCommand
        Returns:
        Itself to allow chaining

      • addDataset

        public SimpleEvaluator addDataset(CrossfoldTask cross)
        Calls the CrossfoldCommand and adds the resulting TTDataSets to the TrainTestEvalCommand. Any exceptions that are thrown are wrapped as RuntimeExceptions.
        Parameters:
        cross -
        Returns:
        Itself to allow for method chaining.

      • addDataset

        public SimpleEvaluator addDataset(java.lang.String name,
                         DataSource source,
                         int partitions,
                         double holdout)
        Constructs a new CrossfoldCommand and configures it before adding the datasets to the TrainTestEvalCommand.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the crossfold
        source - The source for the crossfold
        partitions - The number of partitions
        holdout - The holdout fraction
        Returns:
        Itself for chaining.

      • addDataset

        public SimpleEvaluator addDataset(DataSource source,
                         int partitions,
                         double holdout)
        Constructs a new CrossfoldCommand with the same name as its datasource and configures it before adding the datasets * to the TrainTestEvalCommand.
        Parameters:
        source - The source for the crossfold
        partitions - The number of partitions
        holdout - The holdout fraction
        Returns:
        Itself for chaining.

      • addDataset

        public SimpleEvaluator addDataset(java.lang.String name,
                         DataSource source,
                         int partitions)
        Constructs a new CrossfoldCommand and configures it before adding the datasets to the TrainTestEvalCommand. It defaults the holdout to .2
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the crossfold
        source - The source for the crossfold
        partitions - The number of partitions
        Returns:
        Itself for chaining.

      • addDataset

        public SimpleEvaluator addDataset(DataSource source,
                         int partitions)
        Constructs a new CrossfoldCommand and configures it before adding the datasets to the TrainTestEvalCommand. It defaults the holdout to .2 and the name of the crossfold to the name of the data source.
        Parameters:
        source - The source for the crossfold
        partitions - The number of partitions
        Returns:
        Itself for chaining.

      • addDataset

        public SimpleEvaluator addDataset(TTDataSet data)
        Adds a single TTDataSet to the TrainTestEvalCommand. This acts a wrapper around TrainTestEvalCommand.addDataset
        Parameters:
        data - The dataset to be added to the command.
        Returns:
        Itself to allow for method chaining.

      • addDataset

        public SimpleEvaluator addDataset(java.lang.String name,
                         EventDAO train,
                         EventDAO test,
                         PreferenceDomain dom)
        This constructs a new TTDataSet and passes it to the TrainTestEvalCommand.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the new dataset.
        train - The DAOFactory with the train data.
        test - The DAOFactory with the test data.
        dom - The PreferenceDomain to be supplied to the new TTDataSet
        Returns:
        Itself for method chaining.

      • addDataset

        public SimpleEvaluator addDataset(DataSource train,
                         DataSource test)
        This constructs a new TTDataSet and passes it to the TrainTestEvalCommand. The name for the data source will default to 'generic-data-source'. Because of this, be careful of calling this method more than once.
        Parameters:
        train - The DAOFactory with the train data.
        test - The DAOFactory with the test data.
        Returns:
        Itself for method chaining.

      • getRawCommand

        public TrainTestEvalTask getRawCommand()
        Provides raw unrestricted access for the command. Use this with caution! Calling certain methods on the TrainTestDataSet can force this command to throw an exception farther down the line.
        Returns:
        The raw partially configured command.

      • call

        public Table call()
           throws TaskExecutionException
        If this is called more than once it will call of these commands again and most likely throw an exception.
        Specified by:
        call in interface java.util.concurrent.Callable<Table>
        Returns:
        The table resulting from calling the command.
        Throws:
        TaskExecutionException
